item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
1️⃣ Role description
We are looking to hire a talented YouTube video editor to join our team on a long-term basis. You will be responsible for creating informative and engaging 8-15 minutes documentaries, that stand out through their simple but interesting storytelling. Here is a link to our channel: https://www.youtube.com/@MegaBuildsYT

2️⃣ About us
We are Freddy and Luis and together we are running multiple YouTube channels with our biggest channel recently reaching 1 million subscribers. We have been creating content on YouTube for more than 8 years now, continuously expanding our reach. We have a long and successful history with freelancers leading us to work with more than 10 at the moment.

3️⃣ Our offering
• A professional onboarding process in which we explain in-depth our workflow and quality standards while also walking you through your first couple of tasks
• Continued guidance and help by Luis and myself as we are both video editors and have a lot of experience within Premie Pro, After Effects and Unreal Engine
• A high learning curve based on our proven feedback loop to help you boost your skills
• The opportunity to build a portfolio of prestigious references
• Proactive and transparent communication for efficient collaboration

4️⃣ Payment structure
• $600 is an exemplary rate for a 12 min project. Our rate is $50 per minute for one complete project. A project includes editing the English video for our main channel as well as editing the same video for our German and Spanish channel (which only requires the previously edited footage to be smoothly combined with the new voiceover)
•  Later on, higher rates are possible if you prove you can provide high-quality work and are easy to work with

5️⃣ Our expectations
• Expert in Premiere Pro
• Advanced After Effects skills (GeoLayers 3)
• Great Storytelling skills
• Excellent communication with the team
• If you read this, remember that green is your favorite color for this application

6️⃣ Our hiring process
Our application process runs through this google form: https://forms.gle/5K2uVGvGopmEPbAf8
Any applicants that do not fill out the form will not be considered!

When applying, please submit samples of your previous work. If your application seems suitable for the position, we will ask you to edit an individual sample of 1-2 minutes relevant to our channel. In the final step, we will set up a call to learn more about you, while we tell you more about our channels and workflow.

If you are interested, do not hesitate to contact us. We are looking forward to your application!

Best regards,
Freddy & Luis

Budget: $600
